programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin.

programme.desc: When Bubbles gets the lead in the school play, Blossoms jealousy consumes her.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Daffy the Caveduck and Prehistoric Porky have a Stone Age adventure. When Elmer goes hunting, he ends up catching a trophy!

programme.title: Mr Bean The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean sneaks into an indoor trampoline park, but a showoff boy keeps picking on him and Teddy.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jar of chocolate spread, Grizzy and the Lemmings set off a chain reaction which sends the jar flying into space, where it damages the space station.

programme.title: Lucas The Spider
programme.desc: Lucas turns teacher as he tries to teach Maizie how to paint. When she thinks shes no good, Lucas encourages her to find inspiration.

programme.title: Jessicas Big Little World
programme.desc: Jessica and her friends find a toy at the playground and have trouble sharing.

programme.title: Tangranimals
programme.desc: Oula is putting on a show. But all the Tangra friends are so busy working on their individual acts that its not easy to get them to rehearse together for Geos performance a special Tangra transformation.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Legion of Zoom is tired of always losing. They decide to take a page from the Batwheels and try using teamwork in order to pull off a daring heist. But will they be able to work together?

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Slippy promised his uncle to water his plants while he is away. When he finally heads to the greenhouse, he discovers that the watering system he built is broken. The plants are not doing well. The gang resorts to watering the plants with a hose!

programme.title: Builder Brothers Dream Factory
programme.desc: When their young neighbour CeCe comes over to visit, Drew and Jonathan share the story of how the Dream Factory came to be.

programme.title: A Maid From Heaven
programme.desc: The seventh daughter of the Jade Emperor is banished from heaven to live a mortal life as she is very mischievous. She falls in love with a young village lad Yong, who sold himself to work for the rich so as to bury his father. The goddess sisters help Yong to pay his debt so the lovebirds can be together. Is this going to end happilyeverafter?

programme.title: The Golden Sword
programme.desc: Swordsman Long meets Feng while searching for his missing father and they soon fall in love and marry. When Long is kidnapped by Dragon Gate Palace one day, Feng embarks on a rescue mission and reunites with Long, who manages to escape. Together, they confront the head of Dragon Gate Palace, and uncover a longhidden secret.

programme.title: My Son
programme.desc: Kuo, a polices son, blames his father for his mothers death. He has no job, spends time in night clubs and always gets into fights. One night, Kuo rescues Mei from being raped and they become friends. Kuo wants to support Mei and her family so he goes gambling hoping to gain more money but bad luck seems to be following them with tragic outcomes.

programme.title: Hidden Histories

programme.desc: A corpse clutching a crystal chess piece is found in an old fortress. Lieutenant Muller and a young female intern work on the case. Much to his horror, the clues lead him to his familyowned crystal factory a legacy he abandoned for his police dream.

programme.title: ENTR
programme.desc: Lithuania topped the World Happiness Report in 2024 in happiness of people below the age of 30. At the same time, Lithuania has one of the highest numbers of low wage workers in the EU, and more than 300 000 people emigrated from the country in the last 10 years. So, is Lithuania really the best place for young people?

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: Vision its how ninetyfive percent of animals interpret the world. Every species on Earth is a chapter in the fascinating story of sight. This episode follows that story from blurry beginnigs to mindblowing hexnocular vision.

programme.title: Supersenses 1
programme.desc: See the animals that push the limits of physics, chemistry and engineering to pull off feats that humans can only dream of, and find out how evolution granted them with such amazing abilities. Sometimes it takes a superpower just to survive.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig tells Peppa and George a story about a princess who needs sleep. In the story, Peppa is the princess, George is the prince, Mummy Pig is the queen, and Daddy Pig is the king.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George visit Granny Pig and Grandpa Pigs house. Grandpa Pig has built a tree house for them.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are having a costume party. Peppa is a fairy princess, and George is a dinosaur. Peppa has to pick which of her friends is wearing the best costume.

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a fruit surprises for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Anna & Friends
programme.desc: Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubus new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brandnew pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef wants to host dinner and a show, but struggles when he cant seem to get any of his magic tricks right. Chef aims to make an EXTREME snack for Henrys EXTREME cousin, but he accidentally makes his spicy cauliflower bites too spicy!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes pink lemonade and has to convince Ruby that trying new things can be fun!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Its the day of the Team Truck Challenge, a race where all the trucks get to compete in teams of two! But when Crusher chooses a new partner instead of Pickle, his disappointed sidekick teams up with Blaze to prove his mettle.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Starlas wild west birthday party is in trouble when her cake gets carried off by a runaway train. Can she, Blaze and AJ catch up and save the cake before its too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his barking kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town. Capn Turbot loses his glasses and creates chaos in his path. Its up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: When Mayor Humdingers giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol draws a message on Farmer Als field to tell the space aliens the pups found their lost toy!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: Rubble & the pups find Grandpa Gravels lucky bowling ball. Too bad Builder Cove doesnt have a bowling alley... until now! When a sudden superbloom traps Motor, Lily, and Park Ranger Rose, the pups need a flowerfriendly construction solution.

programme.title: The Thundermans Undercover

programme.title: Danger Force

programme.title: Henry Danger

programme.desc: After a zoo fundraiser goes wrong, Sid must save the day with her family!

programme.title: LES IMAGES DE MADEMOISELLE DEVOS
programme.desc: Flanders, 1922. Suffering from tuberculosis, the young Jeanne Devos is sent to live with an enlightened priest. Twenty years later she becomes the first professional photographer in the Nord. Recounting everyday life at the time, her pictures reveal the keen eye of an iconoclast whose work remains little known.
